description: Customer dimension table containing details of customers, their categories, and billing information.

columns.name: WWICustomerID
columns.description: Identifier for the customer in the worldwide database.

columns.name: Customer
columns.description: Name of the customer or business.

columns.name: BillToCustomer
columns.description: Parent customer account to which billing is assigned.

columns.name: BuyingGroup
columns.description: Buying group associated with the customer, if applicable.

columns.name: PrimaryContact
columns.description: Name of the primary contact person for the customer.

columns.name: PostalCode
columns.description: Postal code associated with the customer location.

columns.name: ValidFrom
columns.description: Start date when this record became valid (datetime).

columns.name: ValidTo
columns.description: End date when this record is valid (datetime, default: 12/31/9999 for current records).

columns.name: LineageKey
columns.description: Key used for tracking data lineage.
